Events that occurred on 28 December.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1916 - Actor Noel Johnson is born.
1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 94.
1944 - Paul Drayton is born.
1952 - Game developer Wendell Lariston Hill, Jr. is born.
1953 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Rayner Unwin.
1971 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to W.B. Crouch of the Southern Cigar, Co..

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
The Fellowship of the Ring travels south along the Misty Mountains.
